TEST.0.title: 2024 North Carolina Division C Regional 5
TEST.0.customHeader:
Names of participants: (Please print neatly)

 
 
 
School Name:

Check your team:  ◻ Varsity     ◻ JV1      JV2     ◻ JV3

Warning: Do not open this packet until given permission to do so.

Note: There are useful notes after this page.

CIPHER.83.cipherString: What drives a teacher is never what lies behind. At the heart of teaching is hope, and hope looks forward.
CIPHER.83.question: A quote by Shawn Davis has been encoded as an Aristocrat.  What does it decode to?
CIPHER.83.author: Shawn Davis

CIPHER.95.cipherString: All which happens in the whole world happens through hope
CIPHER.95.question: A quote by Luther has been encoded using the Fractionated Morse Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote starts with ALLW.
CIPHER.95.author: Luther

CIPHER.92.cipherString: One who has committed a mistake and doesn't correct it, is committing another mistake.
CIPHER.92.question: The following quote by Confucius needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitition Cipher with a keyword of MEND and polybius key of CONSPIRED.
CIPHER.92.author: Confucius

CIPHER.96.cipherString: If you want to achieve anything you must first see the result in your own mind before it will become a reality.
CIPHER.96.question: This Aristocrat is a quote by Donny Ingram.  You are told that the word THE only occurs once in the decoded text.
CIPHER.96.author: Donny Ingram

CIPHER.88.cipherString: Distance lends enchantment to the view.
CIPHER.88.question: The following strange headlines encode a quote by Thomas Campbell using a Baconian cipher. You are told that the deciphered text starts with DIST
CIPHER.88.author: Thomas Campbell

CIPHER.103.cipherString: Most people are paralyzed by fear. Overcome it and you take charge of your life and your world.
CIPHER.103.question: A quote by Mark Victor Hansen has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the letter F decodes to T.
CIPHER.103.author: Mark Victor Hansen

CIPHER.100.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 4879 2679 15768. What do they decode to?

CIPHER.91.cipherString: Our adversaries think they confuse us by repeating their own opinion and paying no heed to ours.
CIPHER.91.question: A quote by Goethe has been encoded as an Aristocrat using a K3 Key Phrase.  What was the key phrase used to encode it?
CIPHER.91.author: Goethe

CIPHER.86.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 02576 38 1349 . What do they decode to?

CIPHER.101.cipherString: Sé un hombre noble, servicial y bueno; porque sólo eso lo distingue de todos los seres que conocemos.
CIPHER.101.question: A quote by Goethe has been translated into Spanish and encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. What does it decode to?
CIPHER.101.author: Goethe
CIPHER.101.translation: Be man noble, helpful, and good; for that alone distinguishes him from all the beings we know.

CIPHER.102.cipherString: People seldom improve when they have no other model but themselves to copy after.
CIPHER.102.question: A quote by Oliver Goldsmith which includes the word WHEN has been encoded as a Complete Columnar cipher.  What does it decode to?
CIPHER.102.author: Oliver Goldsmith

CIPHER.94.cipherString: America is a large friendly dog in a small room. Every time it wags its tail it knocks over a chair.
CIPHER.94.question: A quote by Arnold Toynbee has been encoded using the K2 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the letter D decodes to be E.
CIPHER.94.author: Arnold Toynbee

CIPHER.93.cipherString: What in the world is electricity ? And where does it go after it leaves the toaster ?
CIPHER.93.question: An observation that contains O AFTER has been encoded as a Complete Columnar Cipher.  What does it decode to?

CIPHER.84.cipherString: Did you hear there is a coin shortage in America? We're running out of common cents.
CIPHER.84.question: The following quote needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitution Cipher with a keyword of MUCH and polybius key of BANKRUPTCY.
CIPHER.84.author: Unknown

CIPHER.99.cipherString: I never change, I simply become more myself.
CIPHER.99.question: The following symbols are a Baconian cipher of a quote by Joyce Carol Oates. What does it decode to?
CIPHER.99.author: Joyce Carol Oates

CIPHER.149.cipherString: What a person praises is perhaps a surer standard, even than what he condemns, of his own character, information and abilities.
CIPHER.149.question: A quote by Augustus Hare has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the letter I decodes to E.
CIPHER.149.author: Augustus Hare

CIPHER.90.cipherString: Kind words can be short and easy to speak, but their echoes are truly endless.
CIPHER.90.question: The following quote by Mother Teresa needs to be decoded with the Porta Cipher with a keyword of LIKE
CIPHER.90.author: Mother Teresa

CIPHER.89.cipherString: Sum how dificulties our ezier two endore wen ewe no yur dream is waitign four ewe at teh end.
CIPHER.89.question: A friend who can't spell or type very well encoded a quote by Lisa Mangum as an Aristocrat encoded using a K1 keyword.  What does it decode to?
CIPHER.89.author: Lisa Mangum

CIPHER.98.question: Decode the following quote by William Shakespeare which was encoded as a 2x2 Hill Cipher using a keyword of BOLD.
CIPHER.98.author: William Shakespeare

CIPHER.85.cipherString: Big fires flare up in a wind, but little ones are blown out unless they are carried in under cover.
CIPHER.85.question: A quote by St Francis de Sales has been encoded as an Aristocrat Cipher for you. You are told that the letter Y decodes to T.
CIPHER.85.author: St Francis de Sales

CIPHER.97.cipherString: Television is a medium because anything well done is rare.
CIPHER.97.question: The following words are a Baconian cipher of a quote found on the internet.  What does it decode to?
CIPHER.97.author: Unknown
